body.name: Mini Karaoke Machine for Kids,Portable Bluetooth Speaker with Wireless Microphone, Gifts Toys for Girls 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 +Year Old Birthday Family Home Party(Purple)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 13 hrs 50 mins
features: 【Crystal Clear Sound & Endless Fun】-- Experience high-quality sound with our advanced audio driver and digital signal processor. 5 voice change effects add an extra layer of fun to your child's singing sessions, making every moment more enjoyable.
【Multifunctional Karaoke Machine】 Bluetooth 5.0 with TWS technology ensures instant pairing, stable connection, and an impressive range of 50ft without obstacles. Perfect for parties and gatherings!

【Light Up the Party】 Let your child's inner star shine with the disco lights that create an immersive and dynamic karaoke experience. The independent light button allows for easy control and endless entertainment for hours on end.

【Compact & User-Friendly】 Our mini-sized karaoke machine is easy to carry, allowing your child to take their music wherever they go. Easily switch between modes and adjust microphone, echo, and music volume with ease.

【Perfect Gift for All Occasions】 Our karaoke machine's bright color design and beautiful packaging make it a fantastic gift for kids of all ages. Perfect for birthdays, Christmas, Easter, Halloween, Thanksgiving, Valentine's Day, or any other celebration.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EASY TO CONNECT QUICK CHARGING, LONG LASTING Mini Portable for Kids Adults

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the one with 2 mics. Upon Getting the package I was surprised as to how small it all was, however the sound quality is very good and it is very loud for its size. Alot louder than you would expect! The mics have a decent quality and they have an "echo effect" that can't be turned off. The mics settings aren't seperate from each other, meaning turn the volume up on 1, they both go up. This applies to any controls on the mics whatever changes you make on one, it will do on both. I would say this little speaker even without the mics would be great just to bluetooth to at the park or get togethers. I would definitely buy again if I needed to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I shouldn’t have waited to buy this
reviews.reviewText: I was eyeballing this for a while and wasn’t sure but now I regret not getting it sooner. It works very well and sounds awesome. You can adjust the volume and has 4 magic modes which changes the sound of your voice. The Bluetooth synced up easily and overall I love the color and the lights are cool too because they can be changed to different colors and rhythms

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift for not my own children, so it was great. Can get very loud and the volume is changeable from mics which kids hold 🫣. It’s fun and easy. I paired it with a colorful projector light for epic kids performances.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this because my 9year old niece loves singing and i didn't want to get her a huge karaoke machine taking up a lot of space in her room as we just redecorated it and purged a lot of old things. it is her favorite color and she likes the little microphone. it works well. we had a little trouble figuring out the Bluetooth for a minute but quickly got it going and had a blast. its easily portable for sleepovers too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was bought as a Christmas gift for my niece and my own kids were obsessed once it was out of the package. Colorful lights, loud volume, and different voice controls. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewText: The speaker sound is great. The speaker and two mics are easy to use. Love the lights on the speaker, the set is super cute

I was surprised by the quality of sound/volume and materials of this product! I was skeptical, but I went for it, and was not disappointed thankfully. It's compact, lightweight, very portable, and loud for it's size! I like it👍
So far so good louder than I expected fun for the whole family from kids to grandparents

reviews.reviewTitle: Available in 4 colors and one or two microphones
reviews.reviewText: At the time of this review, this kids' karaoke machine was available in four different colors and a choice of one or two microphones. The one I'm reviewing here has a single microphone. But whichever one you choose; you're going to make the kids happy.These small karaoke machines put out decent sound for their size. This particular one has the option of connecting via Bluetooth, Micro-SD or USB. It does not matter if you turn on the microphone or the karaoke machine first, they will pair immediately. And stay paired for up to 50 feet distance.If you use the Micro-SD or the USB to play the songs, it will immediately start playing once you insert your media. A quick press of the power button will pause the playback. Most buttons have dual functions. The volume up and down will adjust the volume with a short press, but a long press will change the song. The power button also controls the pause function. There is also a button to change the interface and one for the LED lighting effects.You control the volume of your voice with the controls on the microphone. The five voice changing effects are also controlled by the microphone.This particular unit has a headphone jack. Some of these karaoke machines have an aux input instead. Therefore, you need to pay attention to this when you purchase to make sure you get the features you want. I personally like the headphone option as it allows the kids to listen to their music while you get some peace and quiet.This karaoke machine comes with two charging cables, but no charger. You need to provide that along with whichever media you want to use.In conclusion, I love these little karaoke machines. They are fun for both kids and adults alike. An easy 5-stars for this fun little karaoke machine.

I'm reviewing a few of these units. This is the second one I test. The previous one was a K13 model (It have a round led ring and a plastic center for speaker).I previously would recommend the K13 versus the K12, but I've changed opinion. They are basically the same price.The advantage of the K12 is that is look much better in a smaller nicer form factor. Even the microphone, the K12 look better.But I said the K12 sounded worst, and it doesn't have the natural voice option, so by reviewing a different product, it had more instruction and found I could disable the echo/reverbe... You long press the +/- volume on the microphone, and you can change the intensity level of the echo. It will always activate at boot, but you can disable it. As for the sound quality, the trebble is better on the K12, but it lack of bass... After doing more back to back test, I decided to say I prefer this version !My K12 I received had some defective assembly, where the speaker grill doesn't stay attached but that is easily fixed.I also receive another smaller model, the K1 I think, and the K12 is much better. The K1 I got had 2 microphone with it, and to my surprise, the second microphone did work with my K12, so I could use 2 microphone with it.The K13 microphone doesn't work with the K1 or this one, the K12.So it not amazing in term of sound quality, but it a fun toy (and I say here toy), to have.
